feed.title: Firefly III Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Firefly III: v6.1.17
entry.content:
⚠️ This release fixes a security issue, please upgrade at your earliest convenience.

Added

  • New routine that calculates account balances, first start could take a while.

Removed

  • Removed auto-generated language files.

Fixed

  • Issue 8907 (Error when adding initial balance: bcadd(): Argument #2 ($num2) must be of type string, int given) reported by @wnklmnn
  • Issue 8911 (Docker container startup very slow) reported by @daften
  • PR 8929 (icon title chgd from Deposit to Transfer) reported by @stevewasiura
  • PR 8930 (icon title chgd from Deposit to Transfer) reported by @stevewasiura
  • PR 8951 (add icon for delete action) reported by @stevewasiura
  • PR 8957 (Remove nesting level for markdown) reported by @JeroenED
  • Issue 8958 (Weird line appears above the UI when clicking on matching transactions for a rule) reported by @avee87
  • Issue 8893 (API: reconciled: false does not have precedence) reported by @dreautall
  • Issue 8954 (Wrong calculation of transaction without category) reported by @anarion80
  • Issue 8927 (Converting deposit to transfer can set incorrect transaction currency) reported by @avee87
  • Various issues in release train.
  • There is a confirmation again before you delete data using the page in your profile

Security

  • Two (undisclosed) MFA bypass errors, reported by @Skelmis. Disclosure will follow in a few weeks.

API

  • Expand v2 chart API

Instructions

  • Installation instructions for Docker, Portainer, Kubernetes or self-managed servers
  • Or read the upgrade instructions for Docker, Kubernetes or self-managed servers
  • The releases are signed, and you can verify them using the Firefly III releases PGP key.

entry.title: New release for Firefly III: v6.1.18
entry.content:
Fixed

  • Issue 8978 (Error! Internal Firefly III Exception: bcadd(): Argument #2 ($num2) is not well-formed) reported by @el-rhazi
  • Issue 8977 (Data Importer: "500 Server Error" with Firefly III v6.1.17) reported by @qtdzz

Security

  • CVE-2024-37893 (GHSA-4gm4-c4mh-4p7w) reported by @Skelmis

Instructions

  • Installation instructions for Docker, Portainer, Kubernetes or self-managed servers
  • Or read the upgrade instructions for Docker, Kubernetes or self-managed servers
  • The releases are signed, and you can verify them using the Firefly III releases PGP key.

entry.title: New release for Firefly III: v6.1.19
entry.content:
Fixed

  • Issue 8844 (Split recurring transaction gets wrong (split) titles) reported by @dreautall
  • Issue 8981 (bcadd() error during Docker container startup) reported by @NoiTheCat
  • Issue 8986 (Search with "internal_reference_is" finds all transactions with full word of search string) reported by @baflo
  • Issue 9009 (Incorrect Amount Calculation in Reconciliation for Bank Account A) reported by @realzsan3
  • Issue 9021 (Incorrect "Expected Withdrawals" for Daily Recurring Transactions) reported by @xMarcii
  • Issue 9022 (Calendar Not Showing Green Fields for Recurring Transactions) reported by @xMarcii
  • Improved currency exchange rate downloader

Instructions

  • Installation instructions for Docker, Portainer, Kubernetes or self-managed servers
  • Or read the upgrade instructions for Docker, Kubernetes or self-managed servers
  • The releases are signed, and you can verify them using the Firefly III releases PGP key.

entry.title: New release for Firefly III: v6.1.20
entry.content:
Added

  • Enabled the expression engine built by @michaelhthomas. Read more about it in the documentation.
  • Add running balance data, see if it can be used in the layout in the future.
  • PR 9160 (add test cases for api/v1/autocomplete/CategoryController) reported by @tasnim0tantawi
  • PR 9178 (Add test cases for Api\V1\Controllers\Autocomplete\BillController & BudgetController) reported by @tasnim0tantawi
  • PR 9171 (Add about test) reported by @mzhubail

Changed

  • PR 9096 (chore: fix some comments) reported by @withbest

Fixed

  • Issue 9078 (bcadd exception while using POST transactions) reported by @dbtdsilva
  • Discussion 9080 (Incorrect sorting on expense accounts) started by @pc-zookeeper
  • Issue 9084 (API Call for bills/nextExpectedMatch does not update) reported by @marcelweikum
  • Issue 9103 (Default Currency does not apply to Accounts.) reported by @chrisgriff1512
  • Issue 9140 (Dashboard 'Today' option chooses 1st of month (not current date)) reported by @PAS-BC
  • PR 9179 (fix Navigation.php MTD logic to make tests pass.) reported by @tasnim0tantawi
  • PR 9239 (Fix webhook index page when Firefly is not served at root) reported by @jfpedroza
  • Issue 9168 (Custom logout URL doesn't work.) reported by @JC5
  • Issue 9155 (internal_reference_is does not correctly match numeric internal references) reported by @Lrns123

API

  • Expand v2 API

Instructions

  • Installation instructions for Docker, Portainer, Kubernetes or self-managed servers
  • Or read the upgrade instructions for Docker, Kubernetes or self-managed servers
  • The releases are signed, and you can verify them using the Firefly III releases PGP key.

entry.title: New release for Firefly III: v6.1.21
entry.content:
Added

  • Enabled the expression engine built by @michaelhthomas. Read more about it in the documentation.
  • Add running balance data, see if it can be used in the layout in the future.
  • PR 9160 (add test cases for api/v1/autocomplete/CategoryController) reported by @tasnim0tantawi
  • PR 9178 (Add test cases for Api\V1\Controllers\Autocomplete\BillController & BudgetController) reported by @tasnim0tantawi
  • PR 9171 (Add about test) reported by @mzhubail

Changed

  • PR 9096 (chore: fix some comments) reported by @withbest

Fixed

  • Issue 9078 (bcadd exception while using POST transactions) reported by @dbtdsilva
  • Discussion 9080 (Incorrect sorting on expense accounts) started by @pc-zookeeper
  • Issue 9084 (API Call for bills/nextExpectedMatch does not update) reported by @marcelweikum
  • Issue 9103 (Default Currency does not apply to Accounts.) reported by @chrisgriff1512
  • Issue 9140 (Dashboard 'Today' option chooses 1st of month (not current date)) reported by @PAS-BC
  • PR 9179 (fix Navigation.php MTD logic to make tests pass.) reported by @tasnim0tantawi
  • PR 9239 (Fix webhook index page when Firefly is not served at root) reported by @jfpedroza
  • Issue 9168 (Custom logout URL doesn't work.) reported by @JC5
  • Issue 9155 (internal_reference_is does not correctly match numeric internal references) reported by @Lrns123
  • Issue 9275 (Long wait when editing a transaction) reported by @JC5
  • Issue 9278 (Update to v6.1.20 changed Balance of Account) reported by @JeuJeus
  • Issue 9281 (Update to v6.1.20 leads to a type error) reported by @krakonos1602

API

  • Expand v2 API

Instructions

  • Installation instructions for Docker, Portainer, Kubernetes or self-managed servers
  • Or read the upgrade instructions for Docker, Kubernetes or self-managed servers
  • The releases are signed, and you can verify them using the Firefly III releases PGP key.
